entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT, Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:27 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 08:00 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: W 47 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016
